entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Boolean should implement IBitwiseOperators #103141
  • [API Proposal]: System.IO.File to have a method to read a file line by line #103137
  • [mono][aot] Write a tool to collect mono-aot-cross inputs and rsp files from an msbuild binlog #103136
  • HttpClient.Timeout seems to be canceling before expected #103134
  • [mobile][diagnostics] Format native crash output using llvm-symbolizer markup #103132
  • [API Proposal]: HttpClient telemetry extensibility #103130
    9.0.0
  • Null ThreadHandle in .NET 8 #103129
  • [HttpStress] All runs of `POST Multipart Data` failing #103128
    9.0.0
  • Assertion error in `WasmTestOnV8-ST-System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests` #103121
    9.0.0
  • [wasm] Use our python package on macos again #103120
    9.0.0
  • illink: Unhandled exception. Mono.Linker.InternalErrorException: Type ShareExtensionTest.ShareViewController already has applied All. #103115
  • NoWorkload-NoWebcil-ST-Wasm.Build.Tests.WorkItemExecution #103114
  • [API Proposal]: Implement IUtf8SpanParsable on IPAddress & IPNetwork #103111
    9.0.0
  • GC: Enable DATAS by default #103110
    9.0.0
  • NET8.0，Socket，Why can I send so much data continuously #103107

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: Disposable Enumerable #103123
  • CultureInfo "arb" is not a Textinfo.IsRightToLeft Language #103131
  • SPMI Replay failing sporadically #102773
  • .Net 8 Android App crashes only in release on physical device #98232
  • Improve documentation for common globalization issues #96101
    Future
  • Unable to unload AOT compiled library of a highly multithreaded .net library using dlcose() #103028
  • GB1030 dotnet info #102174
    9.0.0
  • NullReferenceException within Thread.StartCallback #102573
  • GC test failure on arm64 mono interpreter #103124
    9.0.0
  • string.StartsWith returns `True` when comparing with some control characters #103116
  • Add string keyed dictionary ReadOnlySpan<char> lookup support #27229
    9.0.0
  • BadImageFormatException when mixing AOT and Interpreter assemblies #102867
  • Add a STJ feature flag treating non-optional constructor parameters as required #100075
    9.0.0
  • sslStream.NegotiatedApplicationProtocol is empty after TLS1.3 renegotiation on Windows #102731
    9.0.0
  • NoWorkload-NoWebcil-ST-Wasm.Build.Tests.WorkItemExecution #103084
  • RestoreTask failure #103113
  • NET SDK does not support targeting .NET 9.0. #103083
  • NopPromptTemplateFactory? #103090

PullRequests

Created

  • [NO REVIEW] Implement DisposeAsync on HttpContent and HttpResponseMessage #103145
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation
  • remove unnecessary Avx512VL ISA flags. #103144
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Add basic support for folding and normalizing hwintrinsic trees in morph #103143
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Dispose IDisposables in RegexGenerator #103142
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution
  • Allow TypePreserve info to be applied multiple times #103140
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Introduce IBufferedLogRecordMetadata #103138
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • TypeDefinitionDocument documentation #103135
    area-Meta
  • Set proper options for connected IPv6 raw socket #103127
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Fix ArgIteratorTemplate::GetNextOffset() for struct{Arr[], float} #103125
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Disable downlevel tests for non-main branches in non-simple WasmBuildTests #103118
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • Remove vestigial HAVE_LARGE_SNPRINTF_SUPPORT checks #103106
    area-PAL-coreclr

Merged

  • [mono] Fix hardcoded .NET 8.0 string in iOS sample #103117
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • JIT: Build and consume FMA and Permute node operands in standard order #103100
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Scan intrinsic methods if we're taking address #103109
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Use JSON source generator in SSE tests #103126
    area-System.Net
  • [mono] Don't allocate the renamable vars buffer in the interpreter unless optimizing #102563
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [wasm] Stop setting problematic runtime feature switches #102934
    needs-area-label
  • Enable CET shadow stack compatibility in `apphost`/`singlefilehost` by default #103007
    area-HostModel
  • [release/9.0-preview5] [workloads] Releases moved #103133
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • In Windows host, use WriteConsoleW for stdout and stderr, and locale enabled print for file output #102295
    area-Host
  • Optimize HttpUtility.JavaScriptStringEncode by using SearchValues #102917
    area-System.Net, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] Fix the `ArgIteratorTemplate::GetNextOffset()` return argOfs for 'ELEMENT_TYPE_VALUETYPE' which is flattened liking struct{Arr[], float}. #103108
    community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, needs-area-label
  • Add a regression test for double Content-Length header in HttpWebRequest #102989
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • Avoid a few allocations in StringContent #103008
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • Remove some uses of #if BIGENDIAN #103097
    needs-area-label
  • [LoongArch64] Fix the TestVector256() size alignment within `src/tests/Interop/StructPacking/StructPacking.cs`. #103112
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [wasm] Fix emsdk check #103027
    area-Build-mono
  • Implement `JsonSerializerOptions.RespectRequiredConstructorParameters` #103096
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Don't query for negotiated ALPN protocol after renegotiation on Windows #102751
    area-System.Net.Security
  • need to account for unsuccessful commit case when hardlimit isn't on #102961
    area-GC-coreclr

Updated

  • [wasm] Intrinsics for blazor #102670
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Add Base64Fuzzer to the repo #103011
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/8.0] [mono][interp] Fix type of args when inlining method #102801
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 8.0.x
  • [workloads] Add net current to current names to make them match in net10 #103050
    area-Workloads
  • [workload] Use the same naming as net9 workload #103049
    area-Infrastructure, area-Workloads
  • Create new X509CertificateLoader #102167
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • [interp] handle box + brtrue/brfalse and box+isinst+unbox.any patterns up front #103052
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Re-write Android PBKDF2 one shot in Java #103016
    area-System.Security, os-android
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2468448 #102770
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Start running pri1 tests on native AOT #103069
    needs-area-label
  • AVX10.1 API introduction in JIT #101938
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Migrate to zlib-ng, part 2: consume it in runtime #102403
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Make normal statics simpler #99183
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Upgrade to CMake 3.26 #103088
    area-Infrastructure
  • Simplified muxer fix #99576
    area-Host
  • [mono] Migrate more ghashtables to simdhash #102476
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Convert remaining array FCalls to managed #102739
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Support TLS Resume with client certificates on Linux #102656
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [release/8.0] Fix NegotiateStream connections between Linux clients and Windows servers #102216
    area-System.Net.Security, 8.0.x
  • Use PayloadReader in System.Resources.Extensions #102379
    area-System.Resources, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, binary-serialization, 9.0.0
  • Fix WhiteSpace validation in HttpHeaders #102693
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • Minor cleanup of the Vector64/128/256/512 implementations to improve fallbacks #103095
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add AbsoluteCompare* APIs #102611
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • JIT: Added SVE `Prefetch*` APIs. #103094
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • [ILASM] Added `/DET` flag for deterministic compilations #85344
    area-ILTools-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Use the new lock type in TimerQueue #103104
    area-System.Threading
  • Remove global spinlock for EH stacktrace #103076
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Implement `IUtf8SpanParsable` on `IPAddress` and `IPNetwork` #102144
    area-System.Net, blocked, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • JIT: Enable layout traversal in LSRA by default #103099
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix typo in ComInterfaceInfo.OptionsAreValid #102384
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [HTTP/3] Wrap Cancelled Request with OCE instead of QuicException #103081
    area-System.Net.Http
  • ILLink: Sweep .override for interface method if the .interfaceImpl is removed #102857
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [browser] Fix: `HybridGlobalization` Invariant function differs from non-Hybrid #103037
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, os-browser
  • [WIP] Enable NativeAOT runtime tests on MacCatalyst #102882
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Prototype an aggressive SSA-based dead code elimination phase #103087
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • TryAddWithoutValidation for multiple values could be more efficient #102845
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Add user_events support for the native runtime events #102523
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [browser] Allow downloading WebAssembly resources without performing other WebAssembly runtime initalization #102254
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [WIP][NativeAOT] Disable `MH_SUBSECTIONS_VIA_SYMBOLS` and enable `-dead_strip` by default on Apple platforms #103039
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [wasm][wasi] Allow to build wasi in library mode #102806
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi
  • Tar: support GNU numeric format. #101172
    community-contribution, area-System.Formats.Tar
  • [wasm] emscripten bump 3.1.56 #100334
    area-Build-mono
  • [RISC-V][x64] WiP: Passing empty struct fields #101796
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Caching: migrate HybridCache api surface from asp.net into runtime #103103
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Caching
  • Add option to change SVE vector length for current and children processes #101295
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Add randomized allocation sampling #100356
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [WIP][mono] Enable runtime tests in AOT modes on linux-arm64 #100685
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Windows CNG virtualization-based security #102495
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [mono] Fix `SwiftError` variable offset calculation #103043
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 9.0.0
  • optimize the store/restore for calleeSavedRegs. #101472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-06
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] add some steps for wasi linux x64 #2605

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Move dotnet.js to aotsdk #2604
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Support using emscripten from Mono workload #2602
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Template code files does not have consistent BOM #41433
  • After installing .NET SDK 9.0 Preview 5, Creating 6.0/8.0 Blazor WASM requires July Servicing (8.0.7/6.0.32) feeds. #41432
  • <AnalysisLevel>recommend</AnalysisLevel> fails with meaningless error #41431

Closed

  • [MAUI][Multi-Project] Downloading the .NET9.0 SDK causes the original .NET8.0 SDK to disappear when creating a project #41280
  • [NetSDKE2E][ARM64]Although we installed the .netcoreapp 3.1 runtime, Test still executed failed and show "You must install or update .NET to run this application...". #41258
  • CLI's --list-runtimes doesn't work well with UTF-8 characters #17451
    Backlog
  • dotnet list package --outdated should list newer versions of pre-release packages #41442
  • [NETSDKE2E]"Unhandled exception. System.IO.FileLoadException: Could not load file or assembly..." show in Output after running "dotnet test --arch x86." #41256
  • Error during dotnet workload restore: Authenticode Signature Verification Failed #41286
  • The latest .NET 9.0 SDK form designer cannot load #41250

PullRequests

Created

  • Revert TestPackage creation changes #41451
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Dispose ZipArchive after usage in ExtractArchiveToDirectory #41449
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.4xx] Add tab completion for 'dotnet nuget why' command #41448
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix a leak of ProjectCollection in dotnet-add-reference #41447
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'main' #41440
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add tab completion for 'dotnet nuget why' command #41430
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • restore older WarningLevel default behavior based on AnalysisLevel #41427
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK

Merged

  • Update Source-Build SDK Diff Tests Baselines and Exclusions #41399
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #41401
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Re-bootstrap with Preview 6 SDK #41417
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [wasm] Import StaticWebAssets SDK only for browser-wasm #41306
    Area-WasmSdk
  • Remove usage of `ComHostCustomizationUnsupportedOSException` #41424
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK

Updated

  • [Blazor] Fingerprint all assets #41244
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Add test for IlcLinkServerGC #40823
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • source-build: bundle NativeAOT libraries with the SDK. #41198
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Implement dotnet test help option #41142
    Area-DotNet Test, untriaged
  • Ensure all template code files have UTF-8 BOM #41376
    untriaged, Area-Common templates
  • Add `--arch` and `--os` options to commands that already support `--runtime` option #37429
    untriaged, Area-CLI

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Ref safety analysis does not properly handle readonly set methods #73872
    Backlog
  • Confusing doc comments and method names in implementation of VB's PENamespaceSymbol #73870

Closed

  • Reporting Roslyn analyzer name is inaccessible through Error list entry in VSSDK for VisualStudio 2022 17.10 #73763
  • IDE0028 catches `ICollection<KeyValuePair<TKey, TValue>> = new Dictionary<TKey, TValue>()` as being reduceable #73879
  • csc.exe hangs on specific file #73789
    17.11
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build feature.debugger.inlineValues-35005.76 #73866
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35005.113 #73865

PullRequests

Created

  • Follow up on added ability to rewrite symbol references in BoundTreeRewriter. #73886
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • A test PR, not for review #73885
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Support offering 'use collection' expr when assigning a List<T> to an IList<T> #73884
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Revert "Merge pull request #73618 from CyrusNajmabadi/sourceGenBalanced" #73883
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Change global option change notification to batch all option changes #73882
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Revert "Merge pull request #73618 from CyrusNajmabadi/sourceGenBalanced" #73881
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Use separate async tracker for SG work instad of reusing workspace async tracker #73880
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add struct base enumerator for interval trees. #73877
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Smart Rename: Provide additional context for renamed symbol #73873
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Prevent IDE0290 (convert to primary constructor) in ref struct #73869
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged

Merged

  • Merge release/dev17.8 to release/dev17.9 #73847
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Needs API Review
  • Update interval tree code for clarity #73874
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove unused package version: Microsoft.VisualStudio.Debugger.UI.Interfaces #73871
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Fix exponential blowup parsing pathological files #73788
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Merges/release/dev17.10 to release/dev17.11 #73875
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix recent break of interval tree efficiency #73876
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add tsx/jsx as recognized extensions for TS #73852
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Disable automatic test discovery for Roslyn in DevKit #73878
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Switch to a simpler algorithm for placing hte interval tree array elements. #73868
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Rename the interval tree types. #73860
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix serialization of capabilities in onautoinsert #73867
    Area-Infrastructure, LSP, untriaged, Next
  • Share the majority of code between the Binary and Flat-Array versions of our interval trees. #73859
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Update MicrosoftDevDivOptimizationDataPowerShellVersion to 1.0.803 #73841
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Switch to workspace service to ensure the analyzer loader uses streams on linux #73809
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Delay reporting of pattern-based using diagnostics #73850
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Async Streams, untriaged
  • Upgrade MicrosoftCodeAnalysisTestingVersion to 1.1.2-beta1.24121.1 #73840
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove semantic model keep-alive code in completion #73844
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • ChildSyntaxList.ItemInternal optimization #73650
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.11 to main #73849
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Reduce allocations in PENamespaceSymbol.GetMembers() #73794
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Use correct get / set inside ref safety analysis #73842
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Improve parser recovery around nullable types in patterns #72805
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Do not report warnings because there is non-array params candidate among applicable dynamic candidates. #73829
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add Blazor component event handling to Blazor SSR #56104
  • "No authentication handlers are registered" but there is one #56103
  • Perf improvement: json, plaintext #56099
  • Expand `AddPackageFixer` to multiple packages #56092

Closed

  • Perf regression: plaintext #56012
  • Perf regression: fortunes, fortunes_dapper, json #56030
  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps, updates #56094
  • MapOpenApi() Response.ContentType=null causes garbled characters in Chinese and other languages #56095
    9.0-preview6
  • Blazor InputSelect does not select the value when using SSR #53167
    9.0-preview6
  • Allow the encoder to split headers across frames #4722
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Strange unicode characters added to DOM #56069
  • Blazor multiple @page with parameters on Home component results in missing static files #56072
  • Perf improvement: mvc #56088
  • Quarantine HeartbeatLoopRunsWithSpecifiedInterval #55297

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix Build From Source example #56105
    area-infrastructure
  • Add support for OpenAPI schema transformers #56093
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal

Merged

  • [release/6.0] Remove references to obsolete storage account variables #56102
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.32
  • [release/8.0] Remove references to obsolete storage account variables #56101
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.7
  • Remove references to obsolete storage account variables #56100
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview6
  • Set content type for OpenAPI JSON document #56097
    area-web-frameworks, 9.0-preview6
  • Pass through CancellationToken when writing OpenAPI response #56096
    feature-openapi, area-web-frameworks, 9.0-preview6
  • Allow HTTP2 encoder to split headers across frames #55322
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking, 9.0-preview6
  • Unquarantine `HeartbeatLoopRunsWithSpecifiedInterval` #56091
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview6

Updated

  • Fix urls in ProjectTemplates/README #55984
    area-mvc
  • Retry CanSendAndReceiveUserMessagesFromMultipleConnectionsWithSameUser #55955
    area-infrastructure
  • Add codefixer to install OpenAPI package from extension methods #55963
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • Annotate SignalR client for native AOT #56079
    area-signalr, NativeAOT
  • Set the baggage even when the trace id is not successfully extracted #55341
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Remove redundant check #55945
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, 9.0-preview6
  • Initial implementation of PAR in OIDC Handler #55069
    community-contribution, area-security
  • Update C# code for #29448 #56086
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Remove dot that is added to URL #56075
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Ensuring cancellation of tokens when using GetLinkedCancellationToken(a,b) #55968
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Add support for updatedTypes in metadata updates #55347
    area-blazor, pending-ci-rerun

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Test] TestLogsUseAppFiltersAndFilterSpecs fails with `Assert.Equal() Failure` #4718
    9.0.0
  • [Test] StartEventPipeSessionWithoutStackwalkTestAsync fails with ServerNotAvailableException #4717
    9.0.0
  • Need help with SOS commands testing on RISC-V. #4716
    Future

Closed

  • Access Denied (5) #4464
  • dotnet tools don't work in read-only FS deployments due to tmp dependency #4457
    9.0.0
  • dotnet-sos for .NET 9 #4590
    9.0.0
  • "ERROR: No CLR runtime found." analyzing dump taken from Linux .Net 8.0.5 #4686
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Merged

  • Remove references to obsolete storage account variables #4719
  • [Symbol] Add manifest generator #4693
  • Change SOS breaking change from warning to error; better dotnet-dump target errors #4713

Updated

  • Implement CLRMA interfaces on top of DAC APIs #4667

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Windows] The title bar is shown doubly if I set `Window.AppWindow.TitleBar.ExtendsContentIntoTitleBar` as false. #22894
  • [iOS/Windows] CollectionView HeaderTemplate and FooterTemplate don't appear to work #22892
  • .NET MAUI: There is an "Invalid color" error on iOS when drawing a pattern using the GraphicsView #22891
  • MAUI Blazor project created earlier in .Net 7 is not launching now with VS 17.10.1 #22888
  • Microsoft.Maui.Controls.ImageSource.FromFile fails in iOS when image in subfolder #22887
  • [WinUI] Displaying an `ActionSheet` does not expand #22885
  • MAUI: Compatibility.Layout<T> doesn't display anything without child.Measure #22884
    Backlog
  • Fail to compile MAUI Blazor Android only in Release build when there is a file starting with dot (.) in wwwroot folder #22882
  • NavigationPage throws unknown null reference error despite being null #22878
  • OnIdiom with Binding doesn't work in Release mode #22877
    Backlog

Closed

  • Custom CollectionView footer disappears when adding items #8761
    Backlog
  • Problem initializing the CurrentItem for the Carousel #18879
    .NET 8 SR6
  • Using Shell, more than 5 tabs works until navigating to another tab bar and back. #22875
    Backlog
  • Android: default Frame BackgroundColor is white, which makes things not visible in dark mode #14916
    Under Consideration
  • Scanner is not working with iOS Maui. #22705
  • BindableLayout placed inside Border does not render elements correctly on iOS. #15025
  • RefreshView TapGestureRecognizer Event does not respond on iOs for items which are only visible after scrolling #14060
  • [regression/8.0.3] Border inside a RefreshView ruins the width of other controls on iOS #18852
  • BoxView on Android does not constrain its width to container #17992
  • Why can we not manually add Android Views to the hierarchy in Android code? Cannot debug existing problem ... #22876
  • [Android] ImageButton Border does not fit to CornerRadius #20801
  • iOS ClearButtonVisibility in the Entry thrown exception #22879

PullRequests

Created

  • [ios/catalyst] fix memory leak in `ToolbarItem` #22893
    memory-leak 💦
  • `Size` and `SizeF` should not throw on `NaN` #22890
  • Fix Android CollectionVIew Header and Footer Template #22889
  • Fix Appium install PowerShell script #22883
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
  • [Windows] Fix code style for `GesturePlatformManager` #22881
    community ✨
  • WIP: HybridWebView control for integrating JS/HTML/CSS easily into a .NET MAUI app #22880
    do-not-merge, area-controls-hybridwebview, 9.0-preview6

Merged

  • [Windows] Optimize getting default font size and font family values #22782
    platform/windows 🪟, area-fonts, community ✨
  • [iOS] Fix setting the CurrentItem on CarouselView load #22861
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview
  • Move docs to wiki #22886
  • Add DarkTheme style for Frame #22871
    area-xaml, area-controls-frame

Updated

  • [Essentials] Add DateTimeOffset overload in Preferences #22815
    area-essentials, community ✨
  • Make `PointerOver` to have higher priority than `Focused` state #19812
    community ✨, area-controls-general
  • [Win] Double tap behavior #20870
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-gestures
  • Fix Action Sheets for macOS #19629
    platform/macOS 🍏, area-controls-dialogalert, stale
  • Batch CollectionChanged events #20036
    legacy-area-perf, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, t/perf
  • Enable Binding inteceptors source generator by default #22856
  • Disallow `NaN`s in `Rect`'s `Width` and `Height` properties #18971
    area-drawing, community ✨, stale
  • Remove LINQ and reflection from EasingTypeConverter #19260
    area-animation, t/housekeeping ♻︎, community ✨, stale
  • [iOS] Fix CarouselView loading previous item #22280
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview
  • Fixed all remaining CA1416 errors #22868
  • [WinUI] Fix DateTimeFormatter for "ddd" #20045
    area-controls-datetimepicker
  • [X] CSS specificity #19335
    area-xaml, stale
  • [X] don't expand types to Extension for x:Static #17276
    area-xaml, stale, Under Consideration
  • added Command and CommandParameter on CheckBox #20717
    community ✨, area-controls-checkbox
  • Entry fields do not work correctly if bound to a numeric property from a ViewModel - fix #22777
    community ✨, area-controls-entry
  • [Android] Border with RoundRectangle - fix #21250
    community ✨, area-controls-border, .NET 8 SR7
  • Adopt chromium methodology for determining tablet on Windows #22809
    community ✨
  • Fix animated gifs in Release builds #22874
    area-image
  • [UI Testing] Add legacy tests (alternative) #22635
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing, testing-legacy-ui-tests
  • [Android] Label.CharacterWrap wraps text too soon - fix #22728
    community ✨, area-controls-label
  • [Windows] Fix ListView insert not working properly #22746
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-listview
  • [Windows] Avoid crash doing Application.Current.CloseWindow of hidden Window #22852
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-window
  • [Docs] Added pending inline comments to Page class #20933
    area-docs, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [X] allow namescope resolution before parenting #22854
    area-xaml
  • iOS Entry & Editor Placeholder font follows FontFamily property #22864
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-entry, area-controls-editor
  • [tests] Try a newer xunit #22860
    area-testing
  • Use DialogFragment for Android modals #22869
    community ✨
  • Add converters to DatePicker and TimePicker for DateOnly and TimeOnly #21989
    t/enhancement ☀️, community ✨, area-controls-datetimepicker
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #22537
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • NET single powerful standard #33923
  • configuration name containing - (minus) are not set well as environment variable #33922
  • Use Nuget.Config file in migrations bundle command #33921

Closed

  • SQlite Error 11 'database disk image is malformed' #33630
  • Implement the new OpenTelemetry Metrics API #25880
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Implement translation of HashSet<T> (and ICollection<T> in general) to OPENJSON query #33920

Merged

  • OTEL implementation, so far matching EventCounters infrastructure. #33633
  • Enable internal feed and runtime usage via templates #33919

Updated

  • Add precompiled query generation to the dbcontext optimize command #33747
